text: (do talaaqo ke pashchaat) phir yadi vah use talaaq de de, to isake pashchaat vah usake lie vaidh na hogee, jabatak ki vah usake atirikt kisee doosare pati se nikaah na kar le. atah yadi vah use talaaq de de to phir un donon ke lie ek-doosare ko palat aane mein koee gunaah na hoga, yadi ve samajhate ho ki allaah kee seemaon par qaayam rah sakate hai. aur ye allaah ki nirdhaarit kee huee seemaen hai, jinhen vah un logon ke lie bayaan kar raha hai jo jaanana chaahate ho
